t: What Was Avalon Books and Why Was it Discontinued?

t: What Brands Are Gated on Amazon? A Complete Guide for Sellers
s: Gating these brands means only authorized sellers can sell restricted brands, preserves their integrity and value. Examples of such restricted brands include Australian Gold Avalon Hill, Glo Skin Beauty, The Body Shop, The Genius Brand, The Pioneer Woman, and Paws Fox Racing Fred.
